sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Upgrade Script-February (sdc Dictionary)</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var dictionaryArr = [{
        'query': 'element=new_purchased_quantity^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request_line',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Updated purchased quantity',
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=new_maximum_budget^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request_line',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Updated maximum budget',
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=original_quantity^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request_line',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Previous purchased quantity',
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=original_location^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request_line',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Previous delivery location',
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=original_maximum_budget^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request_line',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Previous maximum budget',
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=new_location^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request_line',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Updated location',
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=new_location^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request_line',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Updated location',
        }
    }
];

dictionaryArr.forEach(updateDictionary);

function updateDictionary(obj) {
    var dictionaryGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    dictionaryGr.addEncodedQuery(obj.query);
    dictionaryGr.query();
    while (dictionaryGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(dictionaryGr, obj.attribute);
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-12-07 07:34:31</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>b37ab85d53140110ba07ddeeff7b1231</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Upgrade Script-February (sdc Dictionary)</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">825ca2835303101077b6ddeeff7b12d8</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">825ca2835303101077b6ddeeff7b12d8</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_b37ab85d53140110ba07ddeeff7b1231</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-12-07 07:34:31</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
